_header.title: Autocomplete example
_header.description: This example shows various setups using the autocomplete editor, based on the autocomplete library. The setup for each lookup engine is defined in a special callback list.

text.title: Wikipedia lookup (Page titles)
text.description: Enter a text of minimum 3 characters.
